page.title: 07HOTON & PRESTWOLD CHURCHES
page.content: 1985 is a year of decision for {St. Leonard's Church, Hoton}and{St. {Andrew's Church, Prestwold. Architect's inspection has revealed that the buildings require a great deal to be spent on them. (Â£60000 & Â£20000). The Parochial Church Council has recommended that St. Leonard's should be closed and St. Andrew's maintained if funds can be raised. Lengthy consultations will take place before there is a final decision. Fund raising activities have been organised throughout the Parish. Opinion is divided about what should happen, although many feel that the buildings must not be allowed to decay.
